Nikon F (Black) t shirt by Yukio Miyamoto.
Carl Zeiss were first with a single lens reflex camera in 1949 with the introduction of the Contax S.
column2: Through the use of a pentaprism mounted above the lens photographers had the pleasure of what you see is what you get for the first time.&nbsp

column1: The Nikon F was launched in 1959, ten years after Ziess had introduced the Contax S.
column2: The Nikon F swept all before it, it was significantly cheaper than the range finder cameras of the day and every bit as robust.&nbsp
column3: It bacame widely accepted as the camera of choice outside studios.&nbsp

column1: Yukio Miyamoto's images are essentially stills of a 3D CAD image he has constructed.
column2: They are reproduced on our shirts at 1440 dpi.

column1: Celebrate a great camera widely used by great photographers wear our
